Yes, I was using the same JVM with 1.8. The heap I had specified was
1G. No=
w with 1.10.2, I had the heap set to 1G to begin with. After I
encountered =
the OOME, I increased the heap to 3G.

As far as Heretrix processors, with =
1.10.2 
Under the ExtractorHtml Processor I have
extract-javascript false
o=
verly eager link detection false 
      
With 1.8 the option to disable ext=
ract-javascript was not available.
And I may have had overly eager link det=
ection set to true.

Other than that my order.xml is the same for 1.8 and 1=
.10.2
